capability_questions.question: Inquire Member Eligibility NOTE: Applications and Accounts: An individual seeking eligibility for health insurance applies online, via phone, via mail, or in person. Accepted application data is managed in an “account” by the receiving program to enable access to this information during the verification and eligibility determination processes, as well as after the conclusion of the process to support change reporting and for other purposes. capability_questions.category: Business Capability Quality: Timeliness of Process
capability_questions.question: How timely is the end-to-end process?

levels.level_1: mandated requirements for timeliness (e.g., the process achieves results within the time specified by law, or regulation). Eligibility inquiries may take multiple business days.
levels.level_2: use of automation. Timeliness always meets legal requirements. SMA completes eligibility inquiries in less than two (2) business day.
levels.level_3: use of automation. Timeliness always meets legal requirements. SMA completes eligibility inquiries in one (1) business day.
